name: Hulu
0:
”Alexa, tune to ESPN on Hulu”
”Alexa, play Seinfeld on Hulu”
”Alexa, show me Marvel's Runaways on Hulu”
skdetail:
Video Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is for use with the Echo Show. 

To get started just say, "Alexa, open Hulu" or jump right in and ask Alexa:

Alexa, tune to ESPN
Alexa, play Seinfeld
Alexa, search for Marvel’s Runaways
Alexa, change to Food Network
Alexa, show me episodes of This Is Us
Alexa, show me channels
Alexa, rewind to beginning
Alexa, play next episode 

No more buttery-popcorn-fingerprint crime scenes on your remote. You're welcome. 

More details can be found at hulu.tv/voice

Note: Hulu with Live TV plan required for live content. Restrictions apply.
